content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Crude Oil Extraction Structure at position (17.5, 40.5)
Consists of:
- Pumpjack at position (17.5, 40.5)
- Storage Tank at position (20.5, 40.5)
- PipeGroup at position (19.5, 38.5) connecting Pumpjack to Storage Tank

### Copper Ore Mine at position (-46.5, 70.5)
Consists of:
- Electric Mining Drill at position (-46.5, 70.5)
- Stone Furnace at position (21.0, 44.0)

### Copper Plate Smelting at position (21.0, 44.0)
Consists of:
- Stone Furnace at position (21.0, 44.0)

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when furnaces are out of fuel
- Ensure furnaces have sufficient fuel before attempting to smelt items.

### Errors when placing entities too far away
- Move closer to the target position before attempting to place an entity.

### Errors when placing entities not in inventory
- Ensure the entity to be placed is in the inventory before attempting to place it.

### Errors when crafting items without required sub-ingredients
- Ensure all required sub-ingredients are available and can be crafted before attempting to craft an item.

### Errors when crafting items that require a crafting machine or smelting in a furnace
- Ensure a crafting machine or furnace is available and configured correctly before attempting to craft an item.

### Errors when inspecting inventory of entities without inventory
- Ensure the entity has an inventory before attempting to inspect it.

### Errors when placing entities next to another entity with insufficient spacing
- Ensure there is sufficient spacing between entities when placing them next to each other.

### Errors when connecting entities that are already occupied
- Ensure the target position is not already occupied by another entity before attempting to connect entities.

### Errors when accessing non-existent attributes of entities
- Ensure the attribute exists for the entity before attempting to access it.

### Errors due to undefined variables
- Ensure all variables are defined before using them.

### Errors when electric mining drills are not connected to power network
- Ensure electric mining drills are connected to a power network before attempting to use them.

### Errors when copper plates are not being produced
- Check if the furnace is working and has sufficient fuel and copper ore.

## NAMESPACE

No utility functions have been defined by the agent.
